mapper.select:
select requester.*,u.link_phone,u.company_address from inspection_unit_user_requester requester left join requester_unit u on u.id=requester.request_id
WHERE requester.delete_flag=0 AND requester.label_id=#{labelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * FROM inspection_unit_user_requester WHERE delete_flag=0 AND label_id=#{labelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND request_id=#{requestId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
